title: The importance cannot be understated/overstated : r/grammar - Reddit
body: openapple. • 4 yr. ago. In this context, "X cannot be overstated" means that it's impossible to overstate the importance of X (rather than meaning that one isn't allowed to overstate the importance of X). So when someone says "the importance of X cannot be overstated," they're saying that no matter how large you describe the ...
